answers.text:
Hi Jason, 
Her are two examples of other local governments that have allowed students to build housing and the details around the building process. Although these are not policies they should be able to help you come up with a policy by being able to learn from these experiences and successes.
-Katrina Cottage build by SFC collage students
icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/303759
-Eagles Nest built by high school students in Palm Beach County FL
icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/20899
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Jason Ziemer
text: My HRA is looking to create a formal program/policy for our student-built housing projects that will help them with deciding what properties to buy, designing homes, budgeting for these projects, etc. Wondering if anyone has a written/detailed program or policy that we could review?
title: Student-Built Housing
